mapper.select: SELECT DEPT_CD AS CODE , DEPT_CD ||'('|| DEPT_NM ||')' AS LABEL FROM MOM_DEPARTMENT ORDER BY DEPT_NM
SELECT TEMPLATE_ID AS CODE , TEMPLATE_ID ||'('|| TEMPLATE_NM ||')' AS LABEL FROM MOM_GRID_TEMPLATE ORDER BY TEMPLATE_ID

SELECT CODE_CATEGORY AS CODE , CODE_CATEGORY ||'('|| CODE_CATEGORY_NM ||')' AS LABEL FROM MOM_CODE_CATEGORY WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY SORT_NO, CODE_CATEGORY_NM

SELECT GROUP_CD AS CODE , GROUP_CODE_NM AS LABEL FROM MOM_GROUP_CODE WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY SORT_NO, GROUP_CODE_NM
